attributes.title: this app installed malicious malware
attributes.review: Infected my phone with some virus, i think they’re using it to spy . Wish i could give zero stars. It’s awful. Be very careful.

attributes.title: All around bad app.
attributes.review: This is just terrible. It’s actually extremely useless. You get nothing from it.

attributes.title: AGE!
attributes.review: I didn’t like how you had to be 17+ to download the app because it just tells me that the the content on the app is not good for any age!

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: Everything on this app is a lie and is trash. Probably the worst app I have ever downloaded. It made my screen turn orange too

attributes.title: a SLOW DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: definitely needs to be taken down because it took forever to download

attributes.title: Horrid, I regret getting this app
attributes.review: Spreads lies and fake news, so disturbing, will brainwash you with hate speech. Must be a serious bug too, because my phone is now corrupted. So sad!!

attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: Fake news all of it was fake no evidence at all. You have to read it it’s all fake my good president trump said it himself. May god be with you all

attributes.title: N O P E
attributes.review: I do not support this racist, narcissist bigot that is trying to win another term in our country. I downloaded the app to see what it contained and I wasn’t surprised to see his white supremacy reign supreme. #onetermpresident

attributes.title: This app is definitely Not making America great again
attributes.review: This app is definitely Not making America great again

attributes.title: SEXIST APP!! ❌
attributes.review: Don’t get this APP! It’s dangerous and not well supported! It asked what my breast size is when it has nothing to do with it?! Secondly it said if I’m male or female! When i clicked female it glitched me out the app!!
